author: DanielRosa74
message:
fix(curriculum): animations for single finals adjusted (#64732)

Co-authored-by: miyaliu666 <miyaliu66666@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@ Listen to the audio and write the finals in the sequence that you hear.
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-This is `ü` with the second tone.
+This is `ü` with the third tone.
 
 ---
 
@@ -45,11 +45,11 @@ This is `i` with the second tone.
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-This is `u` with the third tone.
+This is `u` with the fourth tone.
 
 # --explanation--
 
-The speaker is pronouncing the finals `ü`, `i`, and `u` in the second, fourth, and third tones, respectively.
+The speaker is pronouncing the finals `ü`, `i`, and `u` in the third, second, and fourth tones, respectively.
 
 # --scene--
 
@@ -72,7 +72,7 @@ The speaker is pronouncing the finals `ü`, `i`, and `u` in the second, fourth,
       "filename": "ZH_A1_pinyin_single_finals.mp3",
       "startTime": 1,
       "startTimestamp": 156.98,
-      "finishTimestamp": 162.13
+      "finishTimestamp": 161.97
     }
   },
   "commands": [
@@ -84,16 +84,34 @@ The speaker is pronouncing the finals `ü`, `i`, and `u` in the second, fourth,
     {
       "character": "Chen Na",
       "startTime": 1,
-      "finishTime": 6.15,
+      "finishTime": 1.83,
       "dialogue": {
-        "text": "ǚ, í, ù",
+        "text": "ǚ",
+        "align": "center"
+      }
+    },
+    {
+      "character": "Chen Na",
+      "startTime": 3.35,
+      "finishTime": 4.05,
+      "dialogue": {
+        "text": "í",
+        "align": "center"
+      }
+    },
+    {
+      "character": "Chen Na",
+      "startTime": 5.59,
+      "finishTime": 5.99,
+      "dialogue": {
+        "text": "ù",
         "align": "center"
       }
     },
     {
       "character": "Chen Na",
       "opacity": 0,
-      "startTime": 6.65
+      "startTime": 6.49
     }
   ]
 }
